div.pre: 2080 Paterno (anc. Inessa), 1915 (794) Burial: before 450 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: c. 40 AR Acragas: 5 didr. Gela: 1 didr. Messana: 5 tetradr. Syracuse: 10 tetradr. Disposition: Syracuse 7 (2 Acragas, 2 Mes- sana, 3 Syracuse); the others listed above went to the land owner NSc 1915, p. 226 Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 224, 239 Jenkins, Gela, p. 157 None of the coins preserved at Syracuse requires a date of burial later than 470-65 B.C.
